metadata.dc:author: Ochoa Urdangarain, O
Sardiñas Betancourt, R
metadata.dc:description: The present study was undertaken in 80 patients with vesicoureteral reflux. Our surgical criteria included the international classification of reflux. The usefulness and complications of the different surgical techniques are discussed, and the conclusions based on our findings are presented.
metadata.dc:title: Tratamiento quirúrgico del reflujo vesicoureteral. Nuestra experiencia.
[Surgical treatment of vesicoureteral reflux. Our experience].
